snippet.title: Best video game consoles
snippet.description: The "next-generation" game consoles are here -- but until their game library hits critical mass, the

snippet.title: Nest Protect
snippet.description: Nest brings crisp design and smart features -- connected and otherwise -- to the humble smoke detector. You don't absolutely need the Nest Protect, but it's fine to admit you want one.

snippet.title: Parents prefer phones to kids?
snippet.description: Those who specialize in child development say they're noticing more incidents of parents ignoring their kids in favor of their phones. For some kids, phones become hate objects.

snippet.title: Sharknado returns! Protect your city with these tips
snippet.description: With these nuggets of advice from Siemens, cities can better prepare themselves to survive a great-white-shark attack from the skies -- or a host of other disasters.

snippet.title: Can social networks protect your kids?
snippet.description: Here's a look at potential safeguards that companies may put in place in light of recent cases of alleged abuse and rape in youth-centric online communities.

snippet.title: How NQ Mobile's Family Guardian will protect your kids
snippet.description: The Android app can access all mobile activity on a smartphone. Bad news for kids, but good for parents.

snippet.title: EasyMount Tablet Computer Vehicle Mount
snippet.description: For parents looking to keep peace in the backseat when it comes to kids fighting over the tablet, here's a simple, affordable solution.

snippet.title: Nintendo 2DS
snippet.description: At $130, the 2DS offers a huge array of compelling software and makes for a great entry-level gaming system to the uninitiated first-time gamer. Just be sure to buy a protective case along with it, too.

snippet.title: Manipulative kids now posting holiday wish lists online
snippet.description: In order, perhaps, to pressure their parents unduly, teens are now posting their holiday wish lists for all to see. Oh, and their biggest shopping influence is, sigh, Taylor Swift.

snippet.title: Nikon D5200
snippet.description: The Nikon D5200 makes a great choice for family and vacation photographers.
